action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:

action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows an indoor swimming area with a circular hot tub in the foreground. There is a large rectangular pool in the background, and a mirrored wall reflecting exercise equipment. The ceiling has recessed lighting, and the walls are painted in a light color.

ANSWER: The image shows an indoor swimming area with a circular hot tub in the foreground. There is a large rectangular pool in the background, and a mirrored wall reflecting exercise equipment. The ceiling has recessed lighting, and the walls
